column4: disasm,idefixx: would that help to do modem->router->computer instead of modem->computer?
sry as disasm pointed out what i said before was probably not correct. are you using a cable-modem to connect to the internet or dsl?
I'm plugged directly into the cable modem -- but i have a router here that I could set up if it would help.
well in that case try to plug your ethernet cable into the router just to see if you can connect to it... if necessary set a static ip.
